Text.Value: There's something strange about you. Are you really a dragonborn?
You dare rifle through my pockets?! You're either brave or stupid - likely both.

EditorData.NodeContext: player has pickpocketed jatlo and discovered a note. Outrage then amusement

Text.Value: Well aren't you a clever one, scale-pest. Faster than these idiots, at least. They mean to hurt Auntie - the best and most beautiful hag in the Realms.
I suppose there's no point in pretending. These idiots have the book. They mean to hurt Auntie - the best and most beautiful hag in the Realms.
If I did, I would not be standing here.
I found this note on you - who is Auntie?
Upstairs, downstairs, in boxes, atop chairs - it matters not. The moment we find it, it vanishes. This is a fool's errand.
Less complaining, more searching.
Have you seen a doll around here?
Then stop wasting my time and go help her.
*There's something strange about this creature. He looks like one of your own, but he smells of blood and moss.*
I won't have it. I'll carve out your corpse and serve it to her on a plate.
If I were with the hag, you'd be dead by now.
But I won't let you - I will carve out your corpses and serve them to her on a plate.
Let's find the doll first - where have you seen it?
I am no novice to battle. You would do well to remember that.
Any idea how to remove the hex?
The doll follows us. I suggested we split up, but the cleric took umbrage. Let us see how she feels when the hag stops playing games - and the killing begins.

EditorData.NodeContext: grim and cold - even at the mention of violence

Text.Value: If you don't want my help, just say so.
Leave.
Are you here to help Mayrina or simply irritate me?
Why not simply leave?
The more you interrupt, the less time I have to find this wretched doll.
Convenient - you showing up like this. How do we know the doll that taunts us is not yours?
Convenient - you showing up like this. You may have the others fooled, but I shall be keeping a close eye on you.
Leave.
Mayrina is an old friend - I wouldn't hurt her.
I don't. Leave - and let us deal with this ourselves.
A doll? This is hardly the time for childish games - either help Mayrina or leave.

EditorData.NodeContext: dismissive, trying to throw the player off the scent of the doll (that he planted)

Text.Value: Hmpf. Very well - but I will be watching you.

Synopsis: Default dialogue with hag spy, a redcap in dsiguise sent by the hag to spy on hag survivors. He is cold and accusatory to the player, trying to throw the player off the scent of the doll (that he sent). If Mayrina is present, Jatlo has used the doll to hex her and turn her into a sheep. If Mayrina isn't present, he's using it to pop up, scare, and generally torment the other hag survivors.
